summary: This is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the technical setup of a shared folder for a new case. The case is officially opened as 'In Re: Epstein Death Investigation' with USAO number 2019R01059, indicating it pertains to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Legal Assistant — Criminal Clerk
persons.context: The individual who sent the initial email announcing the opening of the 'Epstein Death Investigation' case with its official USAO number.

events.title: Epstein Death Investigation Case Opened
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York officially opens a case titled 'In Re: Epstein Death Investigation' with USAO number 2019R01059.

keyFacts: The document confirms the formal opening of a U.S. Attorney's Office investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death on or before August 13, 2019.
The case is officially designated as 'In Re: Epstein Death Investigation' with USAO number 2019R01059.
The correspondence is internal, involving technical setup of shared network drives for the investigation team, indicating operational activity.
All sender/recipient names in the email chain are redacted, showing only their office affiliations (USANYS).
